content: Agency (ESA)The Euratom Supply Agency works to maintain security of supply of nuclear materials for all EU users.Websitehttps://euratom-supply.ec.europa.eu/index_enEmailEsa-AAE@ec.europa.euPhone number(+352) 4301-36338(+352) 4301-35190AddressEuropean Commission, Euratom Supply Agency Euroforum Building 2920 Luxembourg Luxembourg Decentralised agencyEurofoundEurofound works to improve employment conditions and social policies in the EU.Websitehttps://www.eurofound.europa.eu/Emailpostmaster@eurofound.europa.euPhone number+353 1 204 31 00AddressWyattville Road Loughlinstown Co. Dublin D18 KP65 Ireland Decentralised agencyEurojustEurojust supports judicial cooperation in the EU in a range of cross-border crimes such as terrorism, drug trafficking and cybercrime.Websitehttps://www.eurojust.europa.eu/Emailinfo@eurojust.europa.euPhone number+31 70 412 50 00AddressJohan de Wittlaan 9 2517 JR Den Haag Netherlands EU joint undertakingEurope’s Rail Joint UndertakingEurope’s Rail Joint
